related_cards.name: P.E.K.K.A
related_cards.reason: P.E.K.K.A's high single-target damage takes down the Goblinstein quickly, preventing it from accumulating shield stacks or activating its Lifesteal effectively.

description.strength: Custom Troop: A high-HP, enhanced Bandit with powerful base damage. Her Ability (3 Elixir) triggers an extended, high-damage area dash that hits multiple times and clears all small swarms in its path. Excellent for devastating counter-attacks.
description.weakness: Very high elixir cost. The Ability costs a significant amount of elixir and can be wasted if the target is already dead or out of range. Still vulnerable to air troops.
description.popularity: Niche, used in heavy bridge-spam decks for a late-game, high-risk/high-reward push that can instantly take a tower if unanswered.

related_cards.name: Mega Knight
related_cards.reason: Both are high-cost ground units with a jump/dash mechanic that clears swarms, but the Boss Bandit is faster and more focused on a singular high-damage push.

related_cards.name: Bandit
related_cards.reason: A lower-cost version of the Boss Bandit, lacking the high HP, base damage, and powerful Ability.

related_cards.name: P.E.K.K.A
related_cards.reason: P.E.K.K.A's high single-target damage quickly takes down the Boss Bandit for a positive elixir trade.

description.strength: The highest base **HP and single-target damage** of any ground troop. Functions as the ultimate **'tank killer'** (Mega Knight, Golem) and a nearly unstoppable defensive anchor or offensive push when supported.
description.weakness: Very **high elixir cost** and slow movement speed. Only targets ground units, leaving it vulnerable to air swarms (Minions, Bats). Easily distracted by cheap ground swarms (Skeletons, Goblin Gang) or defensive buildings.
description.popularity: Very High, a core card in 'P.E.K.K.A Bridge Spam' and heavy control archetypes, valued as the most reliable single-target damage dealer.

related_cards.name: Mega Knight
related_cards.reason: P.E.K.K.A's immense single-target damage allows her to quickly defeat the Mega Knight, often resulting in a strong positive elixir trade (+1) without needing additional support.

related_cards.name: Electro Wizard
related_cards.reason: The E-Wiz's spawn damage and persistent splash/stun attacks clear the swarms (Goblin Gang, Skeleton Army) that would otherwise distract or destroy the P.E.K.K.A.

related_cards.name: Mini P.E.K.K.A
related_cards.reason: A cheaper, faster alternative that also deals high single-target damage, but lacks the supreme tanking ability and raw damage output of the full P.E.K.K.A.
